name: Bad Girl - Love Game
description:
Bad Girl - Romantic Story Love Game  is ready for you to download it and embark on an incredible and unpredictable teen love journey while reading the best episode story. Girls who are looking for captivating story love games will find this choose your story game highly addictive.

Bad Girl - Romantic Story Love Game  will keep you at your toes with its head-spinning twists and turns. The urge to pick up the phone and read this wonderful and engaging love story is almost impossible to resist. Play the best otome game with choices and become a part of an unforgettable adventure. Download this interactive story game and set off on a spellbinding romantic adventure among college students.

The best teenage love game will sweep you off your feet and give you a chance to create your story. It’s a fantastic experience to be the main character in a romantic story love game with unbelievable twists.
